assertionResults.fullName: Operations Security: KYC & Limits should enforce Single Transaction Limits for Unverified Users (Level 0)
assertionResults.title: should enforce Single Transaction Limits for Unverified Users (Level 0)

assertionResults.fullName: Operations Security: KYC & Limits should enforce Daily Limits for Verified Users (Level 1)
assertionResults.title: should enforce Daily Limits for Verified Users (Level 1)

assertionResults.fullName: Operations Security: KYC & Limits should enforce Monthly Limits for Premium Users (Level 2)
assertionResults.title: should enforce Monthly Limits for Premium Users (Level 2)

assertionResults.fullName: Operations Security: KYC & Limits should validate valid transactions correctly
assertionResults.title: should validate valid transactions correctly

assertionResults.fullName: Penetration Testing Suite SQL Injection (SQLi) should be resilient against SQLi in login fields
assertionResults.title: should be resilient against SQLi in login fields

assertionResults.fullName: Penetration Testing Suite Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) should sanitize input fields to prevent stored XSS
assertionResults.title: should sanitize input fields to prevent stored XSS

assertionResults.fullName: Penetration Testing Suite Authentication Bypass should prevent access to protected routes without valid session
assertionResults.title: should prevent access to protected routes without valid session

assertionResults.fullName: Penetration Testing Suite Authentication Bypass should prevent privilege escalation (User -> Admin)
assertionResults.title: should prevent privilege escalation (User -> Admin)

assertionResults.fullName: Penetration Testing Suite CSRF Protection should validate Origin/Referer headers on sensitive actions
assertionResults.title: should validate Origin/Referer headers on sensitive actions

assertionResults.fullName: 2FA Security Suite should generate a valid 6-digit OTP and store hash/record
assertionResults.title: should generate a valid 6-digit OTP and store hash/record

assertionResults.fullName: 2FA Security Suite should reject expired OTP
assertionResults.title: should reject expired OTP

assertionResults.fullName: 2FA Security Suite should reject reused OTP (Replay Attack)
assertionResults.title: should reject reused OTP (Replay Attack)

assertionResults.fullName: 2FA Security Suite should prevent brute force of OTP (Rate Limiting)
assertionResults.title: should prevent brute force of OTP (Rate Limiting)

assertionResults.fullName: Transaction Security Suite should prevent negative transfers (Validation)
assertionResults.title: should prevent negative transfers (Validation)

assertionResults.fullName: Transaction Security Suite should execute transfer atomically (ACID)
assertionResults.title: should execute transfer atomically (ACID)

assertionResults.fullName: Transaction Security Suite should prevent transfer exceeding balance (Race Condition / Integrity)
assertionResults.title: should prevent transfer exceeding balance (Race Condition / Integrity)

assertionResults.fullName: Transaction Security Suite should log audit trail for transaction
assertionResults.title: should log audit trail for transaction
